item.name: SmartCoins: BitUSD, BitEUR, BitCNY, BitGold, BitOil etc
item.base: USD, EUR, CNY, Gold, Oil etc
item.description: The original stablecoin. SmartCoins are backed by on-chain collateral in the form of the BitShares core currency, to which they can be converted at any time at an exchange rate set by a trustworthy price feed. In all but the most extreme market conditions, SmartCoins are guaranteed to be worth at least their face value.

item.name: NuBits
item.description: Backed by fiat reserves held by DAO appointed custodians with no legal guarantee, as well as on-chain collateral. Pegged to fiat, but not depending on fiat (not holding fiat as collateral).

item.name: USDT (Tether)
item.description: Backed by fiat reserves held by centrally appointed, audited custodians with legal guarantee. Requires KYC.

item.name: TRMB (TaiYi)
item.description: Backed by fiat reserves held by centrally appointed custodians with no legal guarantee (not totally sure as the whitepaper is in Chinese).

item.name: Dai
item.description: Initially backed by fiat reserves held by DAO appointed custodians with no legal guarantee. Becomes free floating and backed by diversified on-chain collateral after gaining network effect.

item.name: Decentralized Capital
item.description: Backed by fiat reserves held by centrally appointed, audited custodians with legal guarantee. Requires KYC.

item.name: DUSD
item.description: Backed by fiat reserves held by centrally appointed, audited custodians with legal guarantee. Might not require KYC.
